channel.title: Magic And Range Bonuses
channel.description:
Basically in items.cfg ive tried changing the magic bonus of chaotic staff however i still seem to hit the same. I Also tried this with rune cbow for range and it seems the same.
[CODE]item = 15040 Chaotic_staff This_staff_makes_destructive_spells_more_powerful. 40000 60000 0 0 -1 65 [B][U]145[/U][/B] 0 5 7 4 18 0 0 0[/CODE]
the bold is what i changed.

item.title: Magic And Range Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

Basically in items.cfg ive tried changing the magic bonus of chaotic staff however i still seem to hit the same. I Also tried this with rune cbow for range and it seems the same.

item = 15040	Chaotic_staff	This_staff_makes_destructive_spells_more_powerful.	40000	60000	0	0	-1	65	[B][U]145[/U][/B]	0	5	7	4	18	0	0	0

the bold is what i changed.
